titles: Honest counsaile A merrie fitte of a poeticall furie: good to read, better to follow.
author: Breton, Nicholas, 1545?-1626?
publisher: By W. W[hite] for William Iones dwelling at the signe of the Gunne neare Holborne Conduit,
notes: Dedication signed: N.B., i.e. Nicholas Breton.
The first leaf is blank except for large signature-mark "A"; the last leaf is blank.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
